devdoc.details: Account factory that creates the upgradeable account signed and verified by ECDSA.

createAccount(address).details: Salted deterministic deployment using create2 and a specific logic UpgradeableECDSAAccount implementation. Use index 0 in salt that allows to deploy only one account from the same owner.

createAccount(address,bytes32).details: Salted deterministic deployment using create2 and a specific logic UpgradeableECDSAAccount implementation. index could be part of the salt if the owner wants to control multiple accounts from the same owner key.

params._salt: extra salt (e.g. using owner and index) that allows for deterministic deployment

getAddress(address).details: Pre-compute the counterfactual address prior to calling createAccount. Use index 0 in salt that allows to deploy only one account from the same owner.

getAddress(address,bytes32).details: Pre-compute the counterfactual address prior to calling createAccount.

params._salt: extra salt (e.g. using owner and index) that allows for deterministic deployment
